title: 1v1 Delay and Gate Defending
objective: Teach players to delay attackers and protect space before engaging.
setup: Create 10x10m grids with two 1m gates on one end. One attacker, one defender per grid.
constraints: Attacker must dribble through a gate to score; defender scores by forcing play away for 5s.
progression: Add second defender for 2v1 situations focusing on cover and balance.

title: 2v2 Compact Box Defending
objective: Develop compactness and cover principles in pairs defending central areas.
setup: Set 15x10m box with two small goals at one end. Two attackers vs two defenders.
constraints: Defenders stay within 10m depth, focusing on compact shape.
progression: Add third attacker to test defensive cover and recovery.

title: Channel Defending and Show Outside
objective: Train defenders to delay and guide attackers toward less dangerous zones.
setup: Mark 15x8m channels to simulate wing areas. 1v1 duels start near halfway.
constraints: Defender scores if attacker is forced outside line or loses control.
progression: Add recovering teammate for 2v1 defending scenario.

title: 3v2 Back Line Shape Practice
objective: Teach small group defending with compact back line and covering runs.
setup: 3 defenders vs 2 attackers in 25x20m defensive zone with mini goal.
constraints: Defenders must hold compact line and delay until recoveries.
progression: Add trailing attacker to simulate late run from midfield.

title: 2v1 Cover and Angle Defense
objective: Work on pressing angle and cover support in small overloads.
setup: 10x15m zone, 2 defenders start against 1 attacker.
constraints: Only one defender can press; other must cover behind.
progression: Add time limit for attacker to score to emphasize quick decision.

title: Compact Block of Four Defenders
objective: Develop horizontal compactness and coordinated shifting as a line.
setup: Set 30x25m zone with four defenders facing four attackers building up play.
constraints: Defenders must not exceed 20m width when ball is central.
progression: Allow attackers to cross to test compact recovery and marking.

title: 1v1 Defend End Zone
objective: Improve delaying and timing of tackles in isolation duels.
setup: 10x12m grid with 2m end zone attackers aim to enter.
constraints: Defender wins by delaying attacker 5s or forcing wide.
progression: Add 2nd attacker for cover awareness.

title: Defend Crosses in Small Box
objective: Train defenders to stay compact and cover central areas against crosses.
setup: 20x15m box near goal with wide crossers and central defenders.
constraints: Defenders score by clearing 3 consecutive crosses.
progression: Add recovering midfielder to support back line.

title: Recover and Delay to Gate
objective: Build recovery speed and composure to delay attackers after losing ball.
setup: 15x20m area, attacker breaks after turnover, defender recovers to delay.
constraints: Defender must prevent attacker scoring through gates for 5s.
progression: Add second attacker to increase challenge.

title: 3v3 Compact Zone Defending
objective: Teach three defenders to stay compact and cover within small zone play.
setup: 20x15m zone, 3v3 defending to small goals.
constraints: Defenders must remain within 12m of each other.
progression: Add neutral midfielder for overload recovery practice.

title: Defensive Wave Pressure
objective: Develop decision-making and timing when pressing waves of attackers.
setup: Half pitch, attackers build 3v3 waves toward defenders’ goal.
constraints: Defenders must stay in compact 20m block until possession regained.
progression: Increase attackers to 4v3 for overload pressure.

title: Two-Line Defensive Block
objective: Reinforce compact team defending with midfield and back line coordination.
setup: Two lines of four defend 6v4 attackers in 30x25m zone.
constraints: Lines must stay within 8m vertically to stay compact.
progression: Add wide attackers to stretch shape.

title: Defending Cutback Zone
objective: Improve defenders’ positioning to block low crosses and cutbacks.
setup: Mark 8x6m cutback area near goal, attacker dribbles wide and cuts ball.
constraints: Defender scores by intercepting 3 passes before goal attempt.
progression: Add second attacker at far post.

title: Closing Ball in Central Zone
objective: Train defenders to stay compact and close ball in central defensive zone.
setup: 15x10m central box, 2v2 defending against passing attackers.
constraints: Defenders must remain within 10m width for compactness.
progression: Add pivot attacker for through-ball test.

title: 1v1 Goal-Line Defense
objective: Develop composure and timing for defenders near own goal.
setup: 10x8m box in front of goal, 1v1 attacker vs defender.
constraints: Defender scores if attacker forced back or wide for 5s.
progression: Add recovering second defender for cover role.

title: 2v2 Cover Support in Channel
objective: Focus on angle of cover and compact defending in wide areas.
setup: 15x8m wide channel, 2v2 play aiming to cross or score.
constraints: Defenders must delay until double-up support arrives.
progression: Add goal to finish if attackers break compactness.

title: Intercept and Cover Grid
objective: Train anticipation and covering angles within compact defensive units.
setup: 10x10m grid, 4v2 rondo style with defenders working on cover and intercept.
constraints: Defenders regain ball via intercept only; no tackles.
progression: Add third defender for triangle cover concept.

title: Delay in Box Defense
objective: Develop composure and patience defending near goal under pressure.
setup: 20x15m penalty box zone, attackers aim to score in tight space.
constraints: Defenders must delay attack without fouling for 10s.
progression: Add second ball for continuous pressure.

title: Defensive Triggers Rondo
objective: Teach defenders when to press and when to delay based on cues.
setup: 15x15m grid with 5v3 rondo. Defenders respond to poor touches.
constraints: Defenders press only on visible trigger cues; otherwise stay compact.
progression: Add directional gates for counter on win.

title: Narrow Block 3v3 Goal Protect
objective: Improve group compactness and coordination in narrow defending blocks.
setup: 20x12m zone with narrow goal. 3v3 defending compactly.
constraints: Defenders must stay within 10m width during play.
progression: Add wide gates for attackers to stretch defense.
